wikipedia_page.main: Richard Beavoir Berens (16 December 1801 – 25 February 1859) was an English amateur cricketer who played first-class cricket in 1819 for Hampshire and then reappeared in 1830 to play for Gentlemen of Kent. He was a brother of Henry Berens. He made four known appearances in first-class matches.His grandson Richard played first-class cricket in the 1890s.

response: Born in 1908, he was the son of Cecil Berens and his wife Mildred Turnour Blackwood, daughter of James Blackwood, and the great-grandson of Richard Berens.
Richard Berens (28 January 1864 – 14 July 1909) was an English cricketer and barrister.
* Richard Berens (cricketer, born 1801) (1801–1859), English amateur cricketer
* Richard Berens (cricketer, born 1864) (1864–1909), English cricketer and barrister
